short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fat Burning Methods - Learn all about the latest and most effective fat burning methods from around the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fat Burning Methods is a chrome extension that gives the user useful information on the best and most effective methods for losing weight. It provides information about different diets and exercise routines, as well as what to do when you eat something that you shouldn't have.

Burn more fat and know exactly how many calories you have burned and how many you need to burn to reach your weight loss goals. Our extension will tell you exactly what you need to do on the best diet for you depending on your chosen level of activity and diet type.
